Uses of Class
peregrine.worker.WorkerDaemon

Packages that use WorkerDaemon
peregrine.worker Worker daemon including PFS (partitioned filesystem) support as well as main daemon interface (RPC, etc). 
peregrine.worker.clientd Client handlers and other associated infrastructure.
